metadata.title: CVE-2017-17524 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: library/www_browser.pl in SWI-Prolog 7.2.3 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: swi-prolog package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
